column1: pitched up and slanting away outside off, Tamim presses forward, meets the pitch and push-drives through the vacant cover-point region
Lakmal finds late inswing and hits the front pad of Tamim. But it pitched outside the leg stump, and it was perhaps bouncing over the stumps too. The opener was struck above the knee-roll
back of a length on off, solidly blocked on the front foot
full and nipping away just a shade outside off, Tamim pushes away from the body and watches the ball skip past the outside edge
full and angling away wider outside off, Tamim shoulders arms
overpitched and outside off, Tamim stretches out but does not middle a drive. Instead, he squeezes the ball through extra cover
short, wide, the extra pace works in the batsman favour. Anamul slashes it with all his might but straight to backward point
good-length outswinger, starts outside off and nibbles away further. Anamul watches it through to Dickwella
off-stump yorker, which is dug out to the covers
back of a length and straying into the hips, does not make contact with a flick but secures a leg bye to square leg
back of a length, rears up and moves past the outside edge near the higher part of the bat
full on off, presses forward but does not meet the pitch, winds up squirting an inside edge to the midwicket region
good length and angling into a forward-defensive to mid-on

Loose, loose shot. Full and wide outside off - possibly on a sixth-stump line - Anamul simply throws his hands at the ball. He has a big swish at it and only manages to drag a thick inside edge back onto the stumps. The leg stump is tilted back. Anamul has a long stare at the bowler, he can't believe what he has done. He has bagged a six-ball duck. The search for a solid opening partner for Tamim continues

good length and angling away outside off, Shakib takes it on the up and drives it gloriously between the covers and mid-off. Chandimal chases the ball but dives gingerly and early, letting the ball roll away to the boundary
Lakmal pulls his length back and gets it to slant into off stump, played back to the bowler
another glorious drive from Shakib. Whoa! Pitched up just a shade outside off, caressed in the gap between covers and mid-off again
good length and outside off, punched on the up to backward point
short of a good length and angling away wide outside off, left alone, off-side wide
pitched up on off stump, forward and driven straight to mid-off
full and angling across off, Tamim plays away from the body, carving a drive to square-ish third man
bouncer on the leg stump, the speed gun says 130ks, but I bet that's a lot quicker. Shakib ducks and the ball soars to Dickwella
back of a length and outside off, nearly 140ks, but stops the batsman, Shakib spoons a drive in front of mid-off
back of a length on off, Chameera hits the bat hard and draws a push to mid-off
136.2ks bouncer on middle, Shakib has his eyes locked on the ball before sinking under it
pitched up on off stump, pushed to mid-off off the front foot
shortish and outside off, punched on the up to cover

Danushka, you beauty! He throws the stumps down from backward point at the striker's end but catch Shakib short. Huuuuuge wicket for Sri Lanka. This was even shorter and outside off, punched into the cover-point region. Danushka tears across to his left, swoops down on the ball and nails the stumps.Tamim called for the single, there was a brief hesitation between the wickets, and Shakib gave up in the end. Danushka is one of the best fielders in the SL side. Can't take him on
full and outside off, tapped into the covers

Another stunning piece of fielding from Danushka. His brilliance in the field has sent back both Shakib and Tamim. He throws himself to his right from backward point now, stretches out with both hands, and snaffles a catch. Credit to Lakmal too for banging it short just a shade outside off, surprising the batsman and forcing him to splice a catch. It actually reared up from a back of a length
Lakmal runs in hard, hits the deck harder, but this bouncer sails over the batsman and the leaping keeper. The ball rolls away to the boundary
good length on off stump, defended back off the front foot
Chameera ventures wide of the crease and angles a full ball in on middle at 141ks, bunted to mid-on
back of a length and angling in at off, 143.6ks, run away to backward point off the face
short on off, Mahmudullah fends it off to the off side
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to extra cover
bouncer on off stump, 136.2ks, ducks under it hurriedly
back of a length and outside off, dabs with soft hands to deep third man
back of a length and angling in on middle and leg, cramps the batsman for room, defended to mid-on
good length and angling into a forward-defensive push back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, Mahmudullah punches away from the body and ends up squeezing an inside edge back down the pitch
just short of a good length and outside off, punched up to backward point. Crisply hit but straight to the fielder
full and angling in at off stump, sort of stops on the batsman, checks his push and plays it to the covers
another checked drive into the covers to round out the over
wide of the crease, short and angling in, fended to cover
back of a length on off, opens the face and pats it to backward point
138.1ks bouncer, outside off, flies through to the keeper as the batsman ducks. Too high, and called a wide
full and outside off, Mushfiq tucks his bat away from the line and lets it go
back of a length and angling into middle, the batsman shuffles across and turns the ball to square leg
dug short and outside off, Mushfiq jumps off the ground and inside-edges it to the covers
back of a length and snaking in, grazes the pad outside the line and rolls past the keeper
full and slanting in at off stump, Mushfiq ventures across off and bunts it to the leg side
fullish and outside off, Mushfiq presses forward and slices behind point
short on off, cramps the batsman for room, stabbed off the back foot to backward point
short and angling in on middle, Mahmudullah softens his grip and defends to the leg side
full on the stumps, dribbled back to the bowler
short, hits the bat hard, fended to the off side
short and outside off, chopped to the covers
good length and outside off, no shot
back of a length and outside off, rides the bounce and guides it to third man
on a length and outside off, helped to backward point
Mahmudullah breaks the shackles and how. He stays leg-side of the ball, hares down the track, and smokes it to the cover boundary. Dismissive
banged in short on off, chest-high ball, cramps the batsman for room. He flaps a pull in the air to the right of square leg
short and angling into a clip to square leg
back of a length and angling in, blocked to point off the back foot
short and angling down leg, deflected off the thigh pad to fine leg

Lakmal has bounced out Mahmudullah! There was only one man at the boundary on the leg side and the batsman has picked out Chameera at fine leg. This was a plan: dig it short and attack the body with assistance from leg-gully and fine leg. This chest-hunting ball rushes Mahmudullah into the hook and he holes out. Excellent bowling and excellent fielding to boot from Sri Lanka
short and outside off, Sabbir ducks out of the way
lifting short ball on off, Sabbir rises with it and drops it to backward point
full and angling into a front-foot bunt to mid-on
Thisara raps the glove with one that bounces from a back of a length. Mushfiq looks to loosen his grip but cops a blow on the glove
full and slanted down the leg side, past the flick
overpitched and outside off, Mushfiq lays into it and thrashes a drive to the cover boundary
short and outside off, Mushfiq controls a hook and hits it to deep midwicket
dug in short on off, Sabbir rocks back and takes it to deep midwicket with a firm pull
back of a length and angling into middle and leg, Mushfiq shuffles across off stump and knocks the ball into the square-leg region
full on middle and leg, pushed up to mid-on
short, hits the top of the bat, defended in front of his feet
good length and outside off, driven off the front foot to extra cover
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Mushfiq softens his grip and plays it to backward point
back of a length and outside off, punched into the backward point region for one
back of a length, moves in after pitching but does not threaten off stump, left alone
flighted on off stump, 78ks, defended back off the front foot
full on off stump, not much turn, tucked around the corner to square leg
Sabbir brings out an adventurous reverse-sweep. He stretches out, picks this full ball from off stump and strokes it to the third man boundary
back of a length, starts outside off, breaks back in, scooped back
tossed up on off stump, Sabbir presses forward and drives the ball to short midwicket
skidder, shoots low on off stump, Sabbir keeps it out
was there an edge on that? Full delivery outside off, it beat the bat or just grazed the outside edge but fell well in front of the keeper
good length around off, 125 kph, very tidy line at just about medium pace, blocked
good length again around off, 132 kph, kept out with a defensive block
full again around off, 130 kph, another block into the off side

drifts down leg, was there some glove on that? Yes, there was. It's a drop, it's poor from Dickwella. Strays on the leg stump, Rahim gets a bit of glove on his flick, the ball flies to his left, but Dickwella gets a bit of glove on that, and then it races away to fine leg.
a tad short and Sabbir picks the length so quickly, short around off, he stays back and lays into a pull, smashed through midwicket for four.
another poor delivery, drifts down leg, worked away to deep square leg
shortish delivery, spinning back in, pushed away to midwicket from the crease
and again, 74 kph, he goes back and pushes the ball to long-on. Just too short
nicely played, a tad short and wide, Mushfiqur stays back and carves a cut fine, towards third man for a couple
on the pads again, swept nicely but straight to fine leg
a big appeal, no says the umpire. Flat, spinning down leg, Rahim misses a flick. Dickwella collects and appeals. Mushfiqur is not happy that wasn't called a wide.

but he strikes ... Mushfiqur has something to say to Sabbir. That was an awful stroke at 57 for 4. A full delivery on middle and leg, the ball moves back in slightly, Sabbir runs down at the bowler and looks to smash him over mid-on but that inward movement takes it off the inside half and lobs to mid-on. What a chance for Sabbir, he has thrown it away.

short and wide outside off, 125 kph, left alone. Why are Sri Lanka targetting new batsmen with short balls? Surely, the better option is to go full and open more options. And go short if it doesn't work?
full delivery around off, a thick inside edge towards square leg for a single
good length delivery around middle and leg, defended solidly.
back of a length delivery, at 125 kph, another solid defensive block from Rahim
132 kph, full and wide, Mushfiqur drives and hits the ball nicely to the deep point fielder
lots of flight around off, clipped to midwicket. All about rebuilding now
flat down leg, swept away to short fine leg, who runs to his left and parries the ball away towards square leg

two more, leg byes. Flat delivery outside off, the ball spins back in. Rahim, it seems, has got outside the line, but the ball rolls away towards fine leg for a couple of leg byes. Chandimal wants to review though. Doesn't look like there is bat, it spun back and hit him on the front leg in front of off. Was there too much turn? Actually, UltraEdge has a spike as it's passing the inside edge, so leg byes may have to be changed to runs.
flat and wide, spinning in, chopped away towards deep point for a run
lovely hit through cover, 72 kph, lots of flight outside off from Sandakan, drilled through cover for a couple. Not a great over this this
a googly, off the pad, down to fine leg for a leg bye.
wow, that's a well-directed bouncer, on middle. Climbs steeply on the batsman who plays it down somehow. Very awkward fend
127 kph, short and wide again, Abul goes after it, and gets a toe-end on the shot, races away past slip for four.

128 kph and taken! So Sri Lanka continue to strike, but Abul Hasan reviews after speaking to Mushfiqur. He should have known. It's a full delivery outside off, the ball comes back in, takes the inside edge and carries through to Dickwella, who dives away to his right. That's an appalling review, you only get one in ODIs, and Mushfiqur or any other batsman can't review now if they get a shocker. A big spike on UltraEdge.
good length on middle and leg, 130 kph, worked away into the leg side, to midwicket
a short, wide delivery outside off, close to a wide but not a wide.
good end, digs it in on middle and leg at 130 kph, Nasir ducks underneath
a very full delivery outside off, driven to long-on for a run. That's too full, poor ball
strays down leg for a wide.
huge appeal, pitches it wider outside off, the ball turning in. Beats Nasir on the inside edge, not given, struck him in front of leg.
full delivery outside off, turning back in, nudged to midwicket
a very full googly outside off, the ball lobs up off the outside half to deep point for a run
full and wide, the ball turning in, defended back
flat outside off, 79 kph, a solid defensive block
good length delivery outside off, defended into the off side
a full and wide delivery outside off, thick inside edge through square leg
on the pads from Thisara, worked away to midwicket
full delivery, seaming back in, nudged away to square leg
a short delivery around off, Mushfiqur gets underneath the length and lets it go
short and wide, too much width, carved away to deep point
tossed up outside off, worked away to long-on.
loads of flight on that outside off, nudged back to the bowler
shortish down leg, worked to square leg with the spin
tossed up outside off, may have been the googly, driven to cover
and driven into the cover region again to end a tidy over
nice start, full and straight, defended into the leg side
on the pads, 137 kph, nudged to midwicket

and gone! A slower delivery around off, the ball cuts back in, the offcutter, Mushfiqur slogs his wicket away now. Not very clever batting. Mushfiqur charges at Chameera, doesn't get to the pitch and whacks it away straight into the hands of short midwicket
leading edge but just wide of cover. Full delivery on middle and leg, he is quick through his flick, it lobs away but in front of cover
a short delivery on middle and leg, worked away wide of leg gully.

wow, how do you get out to that? A short delivery drifts down leg, Nasir looks to swivel into a pull and hit it for six, but all he can do is get a bit of bat on that. Flies to Dickwella's left, and he takes it. Would have been wide, but he wanted a boundary. 80 for 8 now
nice and slow down leg, off the pad into the leg side. A big appeal but sliding down
a googly, short and wide outside off, goes too wide, called a wide

wow, a massive swing. Flight on middle and leg, Mortaza clears his front leg and looks to slog this away. But the ball turns back in, goes through a massive gap between bat and pad and hits leg stump. Not a terrible shot with the circumstances, but flawed execution
75 kph, flat delivery on middle, the ball spins and moves away, beats the bat and somehow the off stumop
a googly down leg, a massive slog rolls away to fine leg
full and wide outside off, blocked
the slog sweep is taken at long-on! A googly outside off, Rubel clears his front leg and slogs the ball into the hands of long-on. Bangladesh are bowled out for 82, their ninth-lowest ODI total
short and wide from Mortaza, slapped to cover from the crease by Gunathilaka
good length delivery outside off, 123 kph, defended into the off side with the full face
full around off, 122 kph, pushed away into the mid-off region. Nice full face of the bat
a half stop from the mid-off fielder, they'll get two, Short and wide from Mortaza, flat-batted to mid-off's left, Tamim chases after it
good length around off, blocked. But Mortaza has overstepped, that's untidy. A free hit. Good call from the umpire, marginally over, but over
127 kph, wide called, pushes that wider, looking to sneak that under the tramline but it's called
smashed for four. A low full toss outside off, Gunathilaka backs away, makes some room and crashes it through mid-on
short on middle and leg, Gunathilaka gets underneath the length and pulls, over square leg, for four. Too easy. A very untidy day for Mortaza
back of a length delivery on middle and leg, nudged into the leg side
a good short delivery, around off, Tharanga bails out of a pull rather late
well bowled, hits a back of a length outside off, the ball pops away off the shoulder of the bat to third man for a run
strays down leg, 127 kph, nudged towards a short fine leg fielder
a slower delivery outside off, tapped towards point for one
back of a length delivery, 127 kph, another quiet tap into the point region for a run
too straight from Mortaza, worked away into the gap at midwicket for one
too straight again, just a simple clip through square leg for a run
nicely bowled, tight around off, defended into the off side, towards cover
a good length delivery outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man
another slower delivery down leg, nudged to square leg
yet another slower delivery down leg, nudged down to short fine leg
short and wide, slashed down to third man for a run
good length around off, Gunathilaka hangs back and swats it back from where it came, right over the bowler's head. Fantastic hit
fullish length outside off, hit into the leg side
a short delivery that is well down leg, another wide
nicely bowled, 129 kph outside off, on a length and moving away, Tharanga hangs his bat out and gets beaten on the outside edge
on the pads, worked through midwicket for a run
full delivery outside off, driven to cover
runs down to the pitch, gets there and drives to cover
flight on off and middle, Tharanga gets underneath the length and nails a lofted drive over long-off. Very simple swing, nicely played
slow around middle, a thick outside edge past slip for a couple

dropped by Tamim at cover, but that's a good effort. Some more flight outside off, Tharanga dances down and lifts the ball towards deep cover. Tamim dives to his left and can only get a bit of hand on it.
nudged into the leg side, towards midwicket
slashy thrashy shot, full and wide outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man
a slower delivery and wide outside off, chopped away to cover
another beautiful languid swing through mid-off for six more. An offcutter, Gunathilaka comes down and lofts the ball cleanly. Too easy
good length around off, worked to midwicket
a short delivery down leg, hustles Gunathilaka on his pull, heaved away down to fine leg

an interesting slower ball, on middle and leg, Gunathilaka misses a flick, struck on the pad. It rolls by, he picks it up and gives the ball back. No appeal. If they did, he probably would have been out.
flat and straight, the slider, defended into the cover region
86 kph, flat and quick on off, another defensive block
85 kph, comes down and drives towards long-off. Got close to the ball with a shimmy down
nicely bowled, 85 kph, slowed up nicely, around off, Watchfully defended
comes down, looking to work the ball into the leg side, a leading edge to cover
shortish around off, defended into the off side
back of a length and outside off, Tharanga throws his bat at the ball and watches it skirt past his cut
back of a length and outside off, Tharanga goes for a big pull but only under-edges it to the right of a diving keeper
full on middle, tip and run to the covers
rides the bounce of this shortish ball outside off and slides it to third man
pitched up on of stump, squeezed to cover off the front foot
full on off stump, Tharanga gets underneath the length and merrily launches a six over the long-on boundary. Lovely, clean strike
tossed up on off stump, smoothly pushed into the covers
short, wide, slapped to the right of long-off off the back foot
dangled up on middle, not much turn, front-foot drive to the covers
Tharanga moves away outside leg, this is slid in, inside edged to the leg side
short on middle, ticked to midwicket off the back foot
floated up on middle, Tharanga dashes down the track, gets close to the pitch and hoists it over mid-on. He watches the ball sail to the boundary again
deflected off the hips to short fine leg
hip-high short ball on the off stump, Danushka lines it up and swats it powerfully over square leg. Bam!
bouncer outside leg, ducks under it, wide
just short of a good length and outside off, muscled across the line to the right of deep midwicket
another bouncer over the shoulder, zings through to the keeper for another wide
back of a length and skids in on middle, nurdled to midwicket off the back foot
tip and run to backward point. SL closing in on the final spot
clipped off the pads to square leg for another single
slid through on off stump, played back to the bowler
fired outside leg, slips past the bat, slips past the keeper and into the boundary
dropped short and wide outside off, Tharanga rocks back and cracks it past backward point, where the fielder throws himself to his right to stop the ball
floated up outside off, he leans into it, caressing the ball through the covers. What a smooth shot
tossed on middle, Tharanga stays leg-side of the ball and belts it away to the right of mid-off
Danushka gets inside the line of this length ball and works it to square leg
Danushka attempts a wild reverse-swat and watches the ball slide past the leg stump
back of a length and nips in on off from around the wicket, cramps Tharanga for room, blocked back to the bowler
dug in on middle, ducks under it
back of a length and outside off, Tharanga employs the latest of late cuts and sends the ball to deep third man
short on middle, cramps Danushka for room, beats the pull, and hits him on the body
short and aimed at the body, shovelled away to the square-leg region, and SL secure a 10-wicket win. They have wrapped up the match in 35.5 overs
